editGroup.title: Edit Group
editGroup.groupNotFound: Group not found. Did you leave the group?

enterRecoveryKey.title: Enter Recovery Key
enterRecoveryKey.subtitle: Please provide your recovery key to continue.
enterRecoveryKey.recoveryKeyInvalid: Recovery Key should contain exactly 48 letters/numbers.
enterRecoveryKey.recoveryKeyNoMatch: This is the wrong recovery key, we are unable to decrypt with it.
enterRecoveryKey.recoveryKeyPartialUnlock: Some keys were unlocked, but not all. You can try uploading other recovery keys.

errors.rateLimited: You are being rate limited. Please try again shortly.
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

crash.title: Well, this is awkward
crash.subtitle: Looks like we had a problem displaying this page.

discoverHomeserver.title: Your homeserver is down.
discoverHomeserver.schemaValidation: We could not discover the server capabilities because the APIs responded in an unexpected format.
discoverHomeserver.httpError: The server rejected the request to discover its capabilities. This could be a temporary error.
discoverHomeserver.serverDown: The server is either currently down, or it is not a matrix chat server. This could be a temporary error.

cryptoKeys.encryptionNotSupported: We failed to set up encryption keys for this device. Please use an updated browser that complies to the latest web standards.
cryptoKeys.encryptionVerificationFailed: We failed to verify some of the encryption keys actually work to decrypt messages.
cryptoKeys.schemaValidation: We failed to initialize encryption keys because one of the APIs responded in an unexpected format.
cryptoKeys.httpError: A network error occurred; we cannot determine the state of the encryption keys. This could be a temporary error.

profiles.missingSessionData: This session is missing required data in order to load the user profile. We recommend logging in again in order to fix this issue.

sync.schemaValidation: We could not load the page because the sync API responded in an unexpected format.
sync.httpError: The server unexpectedly returned an error response when trying to sync chats. This could be a temporary error.
sync.serverDown: The server is not responding to sync requests. This could be a temporary error.

homeserverSelectionDialog.title: Change Homeserver
homeserverSelectionDialog.hostnameHelp: Use your preferred Matrix homeserver if you have one, or host your own.

identityVerification.title: Verify Your Identity
identityVerification.subtitle: In order to access encrypted messages and prove your identity to others, you need to provide your recovery key or import it from another device.
identityVerification.lostRecoveryMethods: Forgotten or lost all recovery methods?

importRoomKeys.title: Import Room Keys
importRoomKeys.subtitle: You can import room encryption keys that you have previously exported from another Matrix client. You will then be able to decrypt any messages that the other client could decrypt.
importRoomKeys.passphrasePrompt: The export file will be protected with a passphrase that you created when you previously exported the keys.
importRoomKeys.backupFileInvalid: The backup file is in an invalid format.
importRoomKeys.passphraseInvalid: The passphrase did not work to unlock the backup file.

landing.title: Group Chat That Respects Your Privacy
landing.subtitle: Matrix is great for playing games and chilling with friends, or even building a worldwide community. Customize your own space to talk, play, and hang out.

login.title: Welcome back!
login.subtitle: We're so excited to see you again!

confirm.title: Log Out
confirm.content: Are you sure you want to logout?

photoViewer.downloadError: An error occurred while trying to download the image. Try again later.

register.title: Create an account
register.homeserverEditTitle: Decide where your account is hosted
register.homeserverEditSubtitle: We call the servers where you can host your account 'homeservers'.

user.title: User
user.subtitle: Create a username & password with full access

register.usernameTaken: Username is unavailable. Try adding numbers, letters, underscores _ , or periods.
register.usernameInvalid: Please only use numbers, letters, dashes - , underscores _ , or periods.
register.passwordInvalid: Please only use numbers, letters, dashes - , underscores _ , or periods.
register.loginLink: Already have an account? Log in

room.directMessageHistoryBeginning: This is the beginning of your direct message history with {displayname}.
room.groupMessageHistoryBeginning: Welcome to the beginning of the {users} group.
room.spaceMessageHistoryBeginningSubtitle: This is the start of the #{roomName} room.
room.leftTheRoom: left the room. They will be missed ðŸ˜­.

encryption.identityDescription: Identity signing keys are used to verify your identity with others. If you lose these keys, you will need to re-generate them, which can result in losing access to all of your encrypted messages.
encryption.roomKeysDescription: Room keys are used to encrypt your messages in chats. If you lose these keys, you will not be able to read old encrypted chat messages.
